page.title: 01INTRODUCTION ONE
page.content: Here is a general introduction to our area,which is a four by three kilometre block,it's grid reference is{04840411. The{River Trent}runs through three of the four most northern squares,running close by Amcotts and Neap House. Most of the squares are taken up by fields and farmland. Six of the twelve squares contain some{housing and{industry},but only one contains housing and industry as it's major land cover. Two of the squares contain{Recreation and{Activity Centres}for people of all ages.For example :Community Centres,Clubs and Pubs. {Education}facilities are limited,and many people have to travel a fair distance to the nearest school.In some cases transport is provided.
